brief.brief: Before work can start on a change, the appropriate approval group must approve it.
The change approval function enables members of the approval group to review the change and Approve or Disapprove it.
Change Approvals do not add new pages to the Change request. They modify the approval status on the last page.

detail.detail: To select a Change request to be approved or disapproved, either press F7 (Authorize) from a blank Change Header screen to select from a search list, or press F7 (Authorize) from a previously selected change.
Service Manager checks the Approval Table against the current operator login ID to verify your authority to Approve or Disapprove the change.
Once a record is selected for authorization, press either F1 (Approve) or F2 (Disapprove), and the approval status for the id's approval group is modified accordingly.
Once one user from each approval group has either approved or disapproved the Change request, Service Manager modifies the approval status for the Change request accordingly.
Once a Change has a status of Approved, you cannot add or cancel tasks until an authorized approver changes the status back to Pending.
To undo an approval, press F8 (Unauthorize) from an already approved Change request. This automatically changes the approval status back to Pending.
